trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: Yinra has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put her to sleep.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
entries: Yinra has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage.
